WorkPlace.Name: Adecco
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Adecco er markedsleder, når det gælder vikar- og rekrutteringsløsninger.
Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

HiringOrg.Name: Adecco
HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription:
Adecco er markedsleder, når det gælder vikar- og rekrutteringsløsninger.
Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Are you looking for a parttime job as a forklift driver in the biggest Scandinavian furniture company?
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
On behalf of IKEA Brøndby, we are looking for flexible warehouse staff where stability, responsibility and independence are key points in your previous work history. The workplace is multicultural, which means English is the primary language employees use to handle their day-to-day operations.


Job description:

Your primary task as a forklift driver is to pack goods at IKEA's central warehouse in Brøndby. It is a requirement that you have at least 6 months of experience with truck driving and are comfortable using stacks because the work requires precision and stability.

The job includes several physical demanding tasks, such as packing goods and pallets to be shipped out to different IKEA shops around Denmark to make sure goods are always bountiful at the different stores.


About you:

  • You thrive with routine determined job tasks.
  • You are flexible and reliable.
  • You are ready for physical demanding work.
  • You have experience with forklift driving, and valid truck certificate
  • You communicate fluently in English.


What we can offer:

  • Day, evening, and night shifts
  • Opportunity to develop your own skills and competences through work experience and continuous training.
  • Independent and cooperative work in a team where you are expected to manage your own tasks and efficiency.
  • A strong team spirit where collaboration, reciprocal respect, and socializing between colleagues is highly prioritized.


Salary & Work hours:

The salary is set to 123,43 DKK/Hour, plus add-ons. Adecco will also handle pension, holiday pay, and sick leave pay. We can offer day, evening, and night shifts from Monday to Sunday.

Interested?

We recommend all qualified candidates to apply for the job today. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact Staffing Consultant Karolina Kujawa at 3838 1104 between 09:00-15:00. Interviews will be held fluidly throughout a longer period, as we will be continuously searching for more candidates ready to join the adventure ahead of us.
